entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' during 'Generate code' #78614
    8.0.0
  • JsonDeserializer.Deserialize throws "invalid start of a value" on a valid JSON #78611
  • Incorrect matching with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #78609
  • [Analyzer] Using StartsWith instead of IndexOf == 0 #78608
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] string.ToLower() == otherString.ToLower() #78607
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Recommend string.ToLower{Invariant}().Contains/IndexOf/StartsWith("lowercasestring") be replaced by case-insensitive comparison #78606
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames #78458
    8.0.0
  • Websocket data received sometimes has an extra "}" at the end in .NET 7 #78345
    8.0.0
  • Significant Reverse(ReadOnlySpan<byte>) performance regression for certain sizes #78604
  • [libraries-pgo] Assert failure: Reached the "unreachable" in getArrayOrStringLength #77968
    8.0.0
  • System.Data.OleDb exception: OleDbDataAdapter internal error: invalid row set accessor: Ordinal=3 Status=UNSUPPORTEDCONVERSION. #29650
    Future
  • Archlinux - Enable Support #5646
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove enumerator allocation in for (HashSet, HashSet) comparisons in SetEquals and IsProperSupersetOf. #78613
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • More robust handling of CERT_CONTEXT with multiple threads #78612
    area-System.Security
  • Update APICompat to be able to pass in multiple suppression files #78610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Allow inline relocations in dehydrated data #78545
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance" #78605
    area-System.Memory
  • Check field's real type before we call getArrayOrStringLength #78601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace MD5 with MurmurHash3_128 in SPMI #78527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add IndexOfAnyValues #78093
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix build error when enabling interpreter #78085
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix arithmetic overflow in Queue<T>'s MoveNext() #78600
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Pod Updates November 2022 #78603
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fold "cns"[cns] for ROS<char> #78593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Avoid duplicate key lookups on replay #78597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cache GenericTypeDefinition to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Implement fallback schema layout #78594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations in SendTo and Quic #78591
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][interp] Remove an assertion. #78596
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: artifacts\bin\coreclr\windows.x64.Debug\IL and System.Private.CoreLib.dll #2097

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to mid dec #2099

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Expand support for indirections #2098

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero-init locals on the shadow stack, simplify lowering code, allow STRUCT-typed PHIs #2096
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Access denied for NuGet package source while build dotnet/cli 3.1.300 Tag #11795
  • dotnet tool install --local takes .config/nuget.config instead of nuget.config in current working directory #23135
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch on net6.0 project results in FileNotFoundException for SystemRuntime #28942

PullRequests

Created

  • 'dotnet configure add' command for adding new config to a solution file #29139
  • Fix EnableRuntimePackDownload logic #29138
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Add switch to disable apphost pack restore #29137

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Sequence Expressions #377
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible bug: TypedReference* (and other restricted types) don't generate Warning CS8500 #65530
  • Autocompletion offers type parameters that already have a `where` constraint #65528

Closed

  • Bug with pointer to array (unsafer unsafeness) #65529
  • Compiler treats `string?` as `string` #65520
  • Receiver of a call taking InterpolatedStringHandler is unexpectedly copied in a way that mutations performed by the method are not observable #65470
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `TResult` type in example diagram for incremental generators #65527
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65526
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #65523
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Avoid ordering dependency in active statement map #65525
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value due to interpolated string handler rewrite #65505
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65524
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove cast of string literal to string #65518
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `GetExternalLoginInfoAsync` should work even when `MapInboundClaims` is `false` #45197
  • Build time environment variables in Blazor wasm #45196
  • Website Import - blazor (wasm) web view not displayed correctly #45195
  • Not updating js module after route change #45194
  • Incorrect OpenApi documentation in Minimal API when using WithOpenApi extension method #45192
  • Error when trying to use compression (Brotli) in Blazor WASM: "Uncaught (in promise) Corrupted padding bits " #45191
  • CLI Hot reload for Blazor wasm still doesn't work in .NET 7 #45190

PullRequests

Created

  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2049674 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttrbute syntaxes #44663
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Add support for comment syntax to route detector #45185
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 7 Android Maui FlayoutPage Crashes on Release Mode When Enable Trimming Selected #11514
  • MAUI iOS .NET 7 + EFCore 7.0.0 doesn't work #11513
  • Entry.CursorPosition not working all the time #11512
  • Label height too small when padding is greater than 1. #11511
  • Changing the theme has no effect on some controls (only in release) #11510
  • Label control with TextType set to Html not able to render some HTML fragments on Windows and app does crash/not come up at all due to this #11509
  • MAUI Blazor `html, body, #app { height: 100%; }` works properly on Windows but doesn't work properly on macOS #11508

Closed

  • [iOS] Cannot publish MAUI app to Apple App Store #11465
    Backlog
  • Slow builds on Mac M1 #11376
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `dotnet ef database create-tables` command #29629
  • HasMaxLength(-1) should force maximum length #29627

Closed

  • Find many objects by key - The right way? #29621
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'System.String Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Diagnostics.RelationalStrings.get_NoConnectionOrConnectionString()'. #29626
  • Reverse engineer Synapse Serverless SQL Pool and Dynamics 365 TDS Endpoint #29121
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that facets specified in the store type name take precedence #29628

Merged

  • Reverse engineering of Dynamics CRM TDS endpoint and Synapse Serverless SQL Pool #29122
  • Fix to #28881 - Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #29417

Updated

  • C# modernization/cleanup in database model factories #29622

PullRequests

Updated

  • Allow Installer to bundle AspNetCoreRuntime by default under FreeBSD #14817
